select wha.ht_warehouse_area_id,wha.warehouse_area_id,wha.warehouse_area_code,wha.warehouse_area_name,wha.warehouse_area_desc, wha.warehouse_id,wha.status,wha.create_user_id,wha.create_time,wha.modified_user_id,wha.is_delete,wha.option1,wha.option2,wha.option3, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, sw.warehouse_name FROM fantech_imes.smt_ht_warehouse_area wha LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON wha.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON wha.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEfT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse sw ON wha.warehouse_id= sw.warehouse_id
and date_format(sf.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and wha.warehouse_area_code like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaCode}, '%')
and wha.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and wha.warehouse_area_desc like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaDesc}, '%')
and wha.warehouse_id like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseId}, '%')
order by create_time desc
